---
title: "SPP for BEL"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
BEL <- read_csv("BEL.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
bel <- ts(BEL[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+51/365.25)
bel %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(bel))
```

```{r}
training_bel <- subset(bel, end=length(bel)-2)
test_bel <- subset(bel, start=length(bel)-1)
fc_training_bel<-forecast(training_bel)
fc_training_bel %>%
  forecast(h=5) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_bel)
```

```{r}
fc_training_bel
```

```{r}
fc_bel<-forecast(bel)
fc_bel %>%
forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_bel
```
